member.name: T:Cavern.Filters.Cavernize
member.summary: Separates ground and height data for a channel of a regular surround mix.

member.name: P:Cavern.Filters.Cavernize.SmoothFactor
member.summary: Ratio of the distance actually moved between calculated heights of ftames. Should be set with .
member.remarks: The default value is calculated with 0.8 smoothness, with an update rate of 240 at 48 kHz sampling.

member.name: P:Cavern.Filters.Cavernize.GroundCrossover
member.summary: Keep all frequencies below this on the ground.

member.name: P:Cavern.Filters.Cavernize.Height
member.summary: The moving part's normalized height from the ground. Clamped between -0.2 and 1, 1 means max height.

member.name: P:Cavern.Filters.Cavernize.GroundLevel
member.summary: Audio that must be played at ground level. Results are from the last frame.

member.name: P:Cavern.Filters.Cavernize.HeightLevel
member.summary: Audio that should be played at the level by . Results are from the last frame.

member.name: F:Cavern.Filters.Cavernize.crossover
member.summary: Crossover that mixes height sounds below its frequency back to the ground.

member.name: F:Cavern.Filters.Cavernize.lastLow
member.summary: Last low frequency sample (used in the height calculation algorithm).

member.name: F:Cavern.Filters.Cavernize.lastNormal
member.summary: Last unmodified sample (used in the height calculation algorithm).

member.name: F:Cavern.Filters.Cavernize.lastHigh
member.summary: Last high frequency sample (used in the height calculation algorithm).

member.name: M:Cavern.Filters.Cavernize.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Separates ground and height data for a channel of a regular surround mix.

member.name: M:Cavern.Filters.Cavernize.CalculateSmoothingFactor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Generate the smoothing factor for a smoothness value.

member.name: M:Cavern.Filters.Cavernize.Process(System.Single[])
member.summary: Cavernize an array of samples. One filter should be applied to only one continuous stream of samples.

member.name: M:Cavern.Filters.Cavernize.PresetOutput(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create empty outputs for a given > in case they are used before processing. This optimizes zero checks.
